I suggest playing custom games with friends if you aren't willing to spend hours upon hours trying to unlock characters and cosmetics.

キーボード操作初ゲームだったので、慣れるのに100時間くらいかかりました。
慣れるでは全滅全逃げでもドンマイです。
でも、全て違う試合なので、本当に面白いです。
海外の人も多いからか、自分の想定していた動きをしない人々が多くて、予想がつきません。

たまにドラマが生まれる時があって、辞められません。
１対４なので、４人側は上手くチームプレーできたり、１人側のほうも4人を蹂躙できる時があります。

なお、注意点としてはプレイヤー同士のコミュニケーションです。
チャット欄は、感情を鍛える訓練になります。

あなたがどんなに善良であっても、ちょっとしたミスや力不足によって、煽られたり、罵倒されることもあります。
あなたが格下ランクであっても、「ez」と言ってくる人（特に鯖）がいます。格下にイキっていていっそ笑えます。
プロフィールの国を見て、差別的なことを言ってくる人もいます。

そういう事態に慣れていないと、言われた直後は辛いと思いますが、自分の常識を超えた色んな人がいるというだけです。
なぜ自分は相手の言葉を気にしてしまうんだろう？と自己分析するのもまた一興です。
罵倒に関しては、相手の勝手な常識を元に強い言葉で怒りを表現している人が多いように思います。（こう動くべきだろとか）
嘲笑系は、よく分かりませんので、各国の文化を検索したりするのが面白いです。

とはいえ、チャット欄も、やさしい世界な時もあります。

色々傷つくこともあるかもしれませんが、新しい世界が広がるはず！

Great game to watch and to play although being honest while giving this game a good rating something I've learned playing both killer and survivor is that it's truly a hard game to begin playing spontaneously. While it's easy enough to pick up, due to it's large player base it's not uncommon to have a brand new group of survivors against a veteran player that's had their rank reset a few times. If you want to honestly pick up this game learn what the perks do BEFORE you play and be prepared to have at least a few bad games at the start. It'll get better as you unlock more perks and items. It's a great game to play with friends and on your own. Love you dbd team

Dead by Daylight was one of the best 4x1 games I have every played, even tough the game mechanics lacks diversity (all about fixing generators), somehow it felt fresh every time you played with the many maps and perks to give the game that extra breath.

I think it is time we got a Dead by Daylight 2, specially with some new mechanics and/or objectives.

The sad thing right now is that it is just impossible to play as a killer, as you have to stay in the queue for a LONG time to actually find a group of players. I really wanted to try out the Chains of Hate DLC but this reason alone discourages me of getting it.

If you are not bothered by bloody interactions or graphic content (limited to blood and death, not nudity), then DBD might be your game. I consider myself a casual gamer and after this game was recommended to me, I wasn't sure if I was into this sort of thing. After playing a few games with friends and brothers, I realized how strategic the game really was and how much teamwork is involved in order to escape the killer. I can't count the number of earbleeding Discord calls I've had with the bros. I highly recommend you give this game a try if you are into third-person action/strategic gameplay. 5/5 if I could :)
